channel.title: k8s on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in k8s on REDtalks.live

item.title: KNOWN ISSUE: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists
item.description: Documented at: 10/14/2022 Review by: 12/01/2023 Overview The following is a common error with AWS EKS Module v17.x: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists Example module use: module "eks" { source = "terraform-aws-modules/eks/aws" version = "17.

item.title: HOW TO: Retrieve K8s Service Account names
item.description: Documented at: 10/07/2022 Review by: 12/01/2023 The following command, referenced freqently in Consul documetation doesn’t work with unique global.name: helm template --release-name consul -s templates/client-daemonset.yaml hashicorp/consul --version=0.47.1 | yq r - metadata.
